sentences.sentence: Two-year carcinogenicity studies in rats and mice have also been completed.
sentences.translation: 使用大小鼠进行的两年致癌性研究也已经完成。

sentences.sentence: This indicates the toxicity and potential carcinogenicity of domestic detergents on fish.
sentences.translation: 研究结果表明了家用洗涤剂对鱼的毒性和潜在致癌性。

sentences.sentence: Whether fluoride was a latency carcinogenicity had been a topic of study the health of fluoride.
sentences.translation: 氟化物是否具有潜在致癌性仍然是目前氟健康效应研究的课题。
